tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE books (
    book_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    author_id UUID REFERENCES authors(author_id),
    publish_date DATE,
    price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE book_sales (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_title VARCHAR(255),
  author_id INT,
  sales_count INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES author(author_id)
);

CREATE TABLE review (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  review_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES book_sales(book_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Book (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_title VARCHAR(255),
    author_id INT,
    ISBN VARCHAR(13),
    publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sales_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    sales_date DATE,
    sales_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Review (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
